title: Games started to spike! PLEASE FIX THIS PLEASE!
body:
Hey riot,

My games start to spike when I have 40 ping and an average of 130 fps. Please fix this issue as many players have experience this problem. 

Thank you!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like you might be experiencing some packet loss.

Could you do the following for me:

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and a link to your ICSI netalyzr results.
